data.name: REVO
data.detailed_description:
REVO is a neon styled and classically inspired space shoot ‘em up with an original, retro fueled synthwave soundtrack. Inspirations include Galaga, TRON, and The Last Starfighter. If you’re a fan of the video arcades and science fiction movies of the early 1980’s, you’ll love this game and find it both familiar and fresh.

You’ve drifted into a sinister space storm far from civilization. Dark ships quickly close in on you. Rescued by a mysterious symbiotic vessel, your only hope of escape is to equip for combat and fight for your life.

Features

  • Manage limited ammo and replenish as you destroy enemies.
  • Collect combat debris to build extra ships and ammo drops.
  • Fight a distinct boss ship in each region to unlock weapons.
  • Change your loadout between battles as often as you like.
  • Enjoy an original synthwave soundtrack and bask in neon glows.

data.reviews:
“Very satisfying, fun game.”
K4rn4ge

“A highly energetic shooter that’s as fast as it is colorful.”
Hardcore Gamer

“Absolutely dripping in style.”
GamingOnLinux

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:

  • OS: 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: 3.7GHz Quad Core Intel Xeon E5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD FirePro D300 2GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
